com.ibm.aglets.tahiti
Class LoginData

java.lang.Object
  com.ibm.aglets.tahiti.LoginData

public class LoginData
extends java.lang.Object

A wrapper to keep track of the login data for the running Tahiti instance.

Author:
Luca Ferrari - cat4hire@users.sourceforge.net Jul 12, 2010
